main event: A round white object, the size of a football, was observed in Springfield, Massachusetts on August 23, 1961.
interesting points: The object exhibited frequent stops and accelerations during the 15-20 minute observation,The sighting was reported by multiple witnesses including children and adults,The object was described as bright with color variations, with some witnesses suggesting it elongated when accelerating,The original observers were familiar with the appearance of aircraft, suggesting they were experienced observers,The trajectory of the object included a straight path with zigzagging when decelerating.
sighted object: round white object size of a football
witness description: two children ages 12 and 13, two adults aged 55 and 34, and one 18-year-old student
